description: Led development of scalable web applications using modern technologies. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions. Mentored junior developers and implemented best practices for code quality and performance optimization.

Developed and maintained full-stack applications from concept to deployment. Worked closely with designers and product managers to create user-friendly interfaces. Built RESTful APIs and integrated third-party services.

Built responsive websites and web applications for various clients. Gained experience in modern web development practices and agile methodologies. Collaborated with design team to implement pixel-perfect interfaces.
Developed data visualization tools for research projects. Created automated scripts for data processing and analysis. Contributed to open-source research software used by academic community.
